entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then periods of snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then northwest 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
